SEARCH

Package org.ddolib.examples.max2sat

package org.ddolib.examples.max2sat
Run mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="org.ddolib.examples.ddo.max2sat.Max2Sat" in your terminal to execute default instance.

Run mvn exec:java -Dexec.mainClass="oorg.ddolib.ddo.examples.max2sat.Max2Sat -Dexec.args="<your file> <maximum width of the mdd>" to specify an instance and optionally the maximum width of the mdd.
